intro: Hi! Welcome to my personal website.
This space is all about showcasing who I am, what I do, and what I enjoy.
Feel free to look around, explore the tabs above, and reach out if you’d like to connect.

uw.description: I study Computer Science at the University of Wisconsin–Madison. I chose this university because of its combination of strong academic programs, a beautiful campus, exciting sports culture, and diverse student organizations. The range of social events and clubs here—paired with accessible academic and career resources—has made it a great environment for growth. In Fall 2025, the new CDIS (Computer, Data, and Information Sciences) building will open, offering cutting-edge facilities and collaboration space designed specifically for computer science majors like myself.

projects.loading: This section will showcase personal and collaborative projects I've worked on. I’ll continue to add new ones over time as my work evolves.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: A responsive, animated website to showcase my work.

items.title: OCD Symptom Tracker
items.description: AI-assisted interface to manage and analyze symptom trends.

contact.message: If you're interested in collaborating, have questions about my work, or want to reach out regarding professional opportunities, feel free to connect with me through the links below.
